2022 Men's Lacrosse Roster

Choose a Player:

47 Ross Buchman

Class Senior

Position D

Ht./Wt. 6-2 / 210

Hometown St. Louis, Mo.

Highschool Mary Institute and St. Louis Country Day School

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

CAREER HONORS

America East Commissioner's Honor Roll (2021-22)

SENIOR SEASON (2022): Saw action in seven games as a key member of the man-down unit…finished the season with three ground balls and three caused turnovers…recipient of the America East Elite 18 Award given to the student-athlete with the highest GPA competing in the conference championship.

JUNIOR SEASON (2021): Saw action in four games at defense, primarily on the man-down unit ... picked up ground balls in wins over UMass Lowell (March 3) and Hartford (March 27) and caused a turnover against the Hawks.

SOPHOMORE SEASON (2020): Saw action on defense against Merrimack (Feb. 29). *

FRESHMAN SEASON (2019): Played in four games and started one as a freshman defenseman.

BEFORE VERMONT: Played lacrosse at Mary Institute and St. Louis Country Day School and led his team to three consecutive State Championship titles from 2016-18 ... Named to the First Team All-State in 2017 and 2018 ... Earned Academic All-American and Adrenaline All-American honors as a senior.

PERSONAL: Son of Craig and Liz Buchman ... Older brother, Brett, attended the University of North Carolina ... Chose UVM because it's a great place to receive a college education while playing lacrosse with an amazing group of teammates and coaches ... Lists Zac Brown Band as his favorite musician and The Office as his favorite TV show ... Intends to major in Biochemistry.

* Shortened season
